input.sentences: it was a family fun day for all the families .
there were games and prizes for the kids .
they got to test their skills against each other .
there was even a band on hand that played songs for everyone .
output.sentences: Taking the kids to an activity convention.
Fun bouncy house and lots of games for my kids and their friends.
Some of the games were skills testing but, you could win a prize.
They played hard and had so much fun.
At the end, a local band had a mini-concert and played a few songs.
